Articles.Content:
Has anyone/is anyone using DSR in place of or in addition to AA when playing KSP?

I don't play in full screen , as I do some KSP movie making 49 minutes of finished, frame by frame Apollo 13 done so far),

and some real time missions where I just want to go read the news.

Was wondering if it looked better/would save on some improvements.

Sys specs: X58/Xenon 5670 Oc'd 4.4 on water, gtx 980, 12gb 1600 Ram, 3 256 SSD in Raid 0 for games/software editing on win 7

Thanks!

I have not tried it myself as my SLI GTX780Tis do not have this feature. But it definitely would look better as DSR works like Full screen anti-aliasing. If i had a 900 series i might try it, but as i already run a 4K monitor it is somewhat unnecessary.

Here, view this 4k resolution screenshot at fullscreen on your monitor to see what KSP would look like with full DSR.

https://i.imgur.com/BSS6LIa.jpg

Thanks, good looking.

Moved to the space Lounge? Seriously Mods? At least move it support.
